The romance fiction industry thrives on relationship storytelling that titillates, enthralls, satisfies its aficionados. Here is a book that translates the principles of romantic fiction and research into a viable romantic screenplay for that box office hit that will be a must-see film. Explanations include the difference between a love story and a romance, the Relationship Plane, the Steps of Intimacy, romance's unique characterization requirements, romance as main plot vs. subplot and much more.
